options.content: High-Availability Zonal Load Balancing (HAZL) Dashboard

targets.expr:
sum(rate(response_total{direction="outbound", classification="success", namespace=~"$client_namespace", deployment=~"$client_deployment"}[1m])) by (deployment)
/
sum(rate(response_total{direction="outbound", namespace=~"$client_namespace", deployment=~"$client_deployment"}[1m])) by (deployment)
